name: Titanium.UI.DashboardItem
summary: A dashboard item is a view that is displayed as an icon in a Titanium.UI.DashboardView.

events.name: click
events.summary: Fired when a click is detected against the view.

properties.name: location
properties.summary: Coordinates x and y of the event from the parent view's coordinate system.

properties.name: item
properties.summary: Item that was clicked.

properties.name: bubbles
properties.summary: True if the event will try to bubble up if possible.

properties.name: cancelBubble
properties.summary: Set to true to stop the event from bubbling.

properties.name: source
properties.summary: Source object that fired the event.

properties.name: type
properties.summary: Name of the event fired.

events.name: delete
events.summary: Fired when an item is deleted during editing mode.

properties.name: item
properties.summary: Item that was deleted.

properties.name: bubbles
properties.summary: True if the event will try to bubble up if possible.

properties.name: cancelBubble
properties.summary: Set to true to stop the event from bubbling.

properties.name: source
properties.summary: Source object that fired the event.

properties.name: type
properties.summary: Name of the event fired.

events.name: move
events.summary: Fired when an item is moved during editing mode.

properties.name: items
properties.summary: List of items to be committed, possibly in new order, when edit mode ends.

properties.name: item
properties.summary: Item that was moved.

properties.name: bubbles
properties.summary: True if the event will try to bubble up if possible.

properties.name: cancelBubble
properties.summary: Set to true to stop the event from bubbling.

properties.name: source
properties.summary: Source object that fired the event.

properties.name: type
properties.summary: Name of the event fired.

properties.name: badge
properties.summary: Integer value displayed in a badge.
properties.description: Set to 0 to reset and remove the badge.

properties.name: canDelete
properties.summary: Determines whether this item can be deleted when it edit mode.

properties.name: image
properties.summary: Image or path to image to display in the item by default.

properties.name: selectedImage
properties.summary: Image or path to image to display in the item as it is selected.
